unnormalised: Arrey yaar, I've been trying to book a tatkal ticket with IRCTC, but my PNR status is still showing as WL! Hope I get a confirmed seat before 10/10/24; otherwise, my trip to Goa will be cancelled.
normalised: Arrey yaar, I've been trying to book a tatkal ticket with I-R-C-T-C, but my P-N-R status is still showing as W-L! Hope I get a confirmed seat before tenth october two thousand and twenty four; otherwise, my trip to Goa will be cancelled.
